message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to get a great deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of a lower price. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $90?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $110.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking to save some more. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $105?
I understand you're trying to save some more, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $110. I'm willing to make a slight concession, so I'm counteroffering at $108.
I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, but I'm still looking to save a bit more. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $106?
I've made a few concessions already, and I'm starting to think that I'm giving you a great deal. I'm willing to meet you at $107, but that's as low as I'm willing to go.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $107, but I'm still a bit short of my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $105?
